ygData.subject: RE: New Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t say it was bugfree. I said it would not change on you. I loved Daggerfall. I saved often because the bugs were predictable and I d just realize that
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't say it was bugfree. I said it would not change on you.
I loved Daggerfall. I saved often because the bugs were predictable and I'd
just realize that it was part of the game.

But everytime you played, everything worked the same.

The fact it had bugs does not invalidate what I said.

I wish it ran on my current computer. It would do well for those times
when I could not play Everquest still :)

On Wed, 15 Sep 1999, Mr. J Daniels wrote:

> Heheh, what a perfect example of a game that ships bug free. LOL.
>
> > If you want a game that never changes, do not play an online game. Buy one
> > of the off the shelf games. Daggerfall. Or something like taht. Online games
> > will change on you.

===================================================
Sarah sarah@...
===================================================
My picture of the world is of masses of people extending gifts to other
people, doing favors -- but nobody keeping score. -- Dr. Whitsett
===================================================
